patthana16.55:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.55:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.55:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.55:5.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naarūpī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.55:5.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
